summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2012/12/28 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Gabrielle Salvatore', 'Ron Cornwall', 'Keith Koslov'], 'Producers': ['Matthew Ostrom', 'Laura Palumbo Johnson', 'Jordan Brodsky', 'Brian Flanagan', 'Dominick Pupa', 'Jonathan Partridge', 'Marni Ellis'], 'Studio': ['TLC']} Review Text: Decent show if you like this kind of stuff. It was a test to see how the whole prime thing worked. Review Title: Was new to Prime, Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/04/12 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Zemeckis'], 'Producers': ['Robert Zemeckis', 'Steve Starkey', 'Carl Sagan', 'Ann Druyan'], 'Starring': ['Jodie Foster', 'Matthew McConaughey', 'James Woods']} Review Text: This movie is one heck of a ride. It will leave you guessing until the end, all the performances are really well done. The special effects are still holding up but are showing their age, but all in all it's a very good story and isn't that what makes a good movie? Review Title: Worth it! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/04/12 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Egami'], 'Starring': ['Gabriel Iglesias'], 'Studio': ['Egami']} Review Text: Stand up comedy at it's finest! Yes there are some "adult" themes but it was very refreshing to watch a entertainer that wasn't dropping a F bomb and words related to it every 5 minutes. Not that I find that kind of language offensive but to have a comedian not rely on those words to be funny... I'll be buying the DVD... Review Title: Funny, Funny, Funny! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/04/17 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['KOBUN'], 'Producers': ['Shinsaku Tanaka', 'Ryuji Sekine', 'Hisato Usui', 'Takuro Hatakeyama'], 'Starring': ['Aoi Yuki', 'Daisuke Hirakawa', 'Rie Kugimiya'], 'Studio': ['A-Net Digital']} Review Text: The animation is different than the majority of the anime out there which is a plus, but since the "censorship" ink splashes detract from the visual which in this case has didn't really impact the storyline but did detract from the flow of the visuals. That is why I gave it the rating I did. Additionally since I am over 21 and live in a locality in which I am not prohibited in the viewing of adult images either of a sexual nature or of a violent nature I find that not having the option of choosing which version to watch rather distasteful Review Title: Mixed Bag Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mythbusters Review Date: 2013/06/17 Categories: Unscripted, Documentary, Kids, Special Interest Product Description: ['Adam Savage and Jamie Hyneman are at it again--getting to the bottom of popular myths one experiment at a time by combining science, curiosity, and inventiveness. Watch as Adam, Jamie and the rest of the MythBusters team see what really happens when you take candy from a baby, if people really do get cold feet when they are afraid, what happens when poop literally hits the fan and much more in this season of MythBusters.'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Alice Dallow', 'Lauren Gray Williams', 'Tabitha Lentle', 'Steve Christiansen', 'Peter Rees', 'Andrew Farrell', 'Brian Leckey', 'Rob Hammersley', 'Eric Haven'], 'Producers': ['Linda Wolkovitch']} Review Text: Mythbusters, what else can I say? Your either a fan or your not. Since I'm a fan.. It's really cool how science and entertainment can come to together in such a way that can be imitated but never replicated Review Title: Mythbusters.. What else needs to be said? Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/08/29 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brad Bird'], 'Producers': ['Tom Cruise', 'J.J. Abrams', 'Bryan Burk'], 'Starring': ['Tom Cruise', 'Jeremy Renner', 'Simon Pegg'], 'Studio': ['Hit Movies']} Review Text: This is one of those movies that is a great popcorn flick, but since Brad Bird directed it its a live action comic book Review Title: Brad Bird, at it again Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/13 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Dennis Principe Jr.', 'Julie Auerbach', 'Russell McCarroll', 'Stewart Shields', 'Matthew Ginsburg', 'Gary Auerbach', 'Gail Berman', 'Ron Brody', 'Tina Gazzerro', 'Lloyd Braun'], 'Studio': ['History']} Review Text: This is basically an anti - conspiracy show which is refreshing out of all the pro-conspiracy type of entertainment out there.
There are some episodes that I feel are a little light on the details but overall a decent show Review Title: Interesting Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/05/31 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Chris Sanders', 'Stephen C. Harris', 'Daniel Ollek', 'Hudie Ayalon', 'Mark Phillips', 'Eric Anderson', 'Courtney McKenna', 'Jesse Carter Russell', 'Merlin Camozzi', 'Renee Tod'], 'Studio': ['A&E Television Networks']} Review Text: Who doesn't like a good ghost story? Is very good that it's from real people, the only down side is that it seems like certain people just "give up" in this series and accept the abuse/etc from the ghosts Review Title: The real deal Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/05/31 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Unavailable'], 'Producers': ['Bellevue Entertainment'], 'Studio': ['Unavailable']} Review Text: Very nicely produced series, a great deal of very beautiful scenery but there are times it seems like it's a advertisement for the national park service.. Review Title: Travel anyone? Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: RWBY Review Date: 2014/07/21 Store: Barbara Dunkelman (Actor), Kara Eberle (Actor), Monty Oum (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Product Description', 'From the creators of smash hit Red vs. Blue comes RWBY, a visually-stunning and hotly anticipated new anime series. A young hero, an exalted heiress, a troubled rogue, and a party girl… These are the four members of RWBY, a team brought together and trained for the sole purpose of combating the rampant evils that plague the fantastic world of Remnant.', 'Amazon.com', 'RWBY', "(2013) is an anime-styled American web series from Rooster Teeth Studio; its title comes from the initials of the four main characters: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang. Ruby Rose is an eager, weapon-wielding 15-year-old who's about to enter the Beacon Academy to train to become a huntress, a warrior who fights the evils that plague the world of Remnant. She's put on a team with three other standard-issue young women: spoiled, self-assured Weiss Schnee; intellectual Blake Belladonna, who hides a dark past; and enthusiastic, supportive Yang Xiao Long. The uneasy quartet and their friends from other teams are soon training to handle weapons, carry out missions, slay monsters, and function as a team. As", 'RWBY', 'was created for the web on an obviously limited budget, the animation and designs are minimal at best. Secondary characters appear as black silhouettes and important actions often take place off camera or behind a screen of dust. The episodes only last 16 minutes, including the opening and closing titles, which may be a more awkward length to direct than the standard half-hour. Sometimes too much action is crowded into too short a space; other episodes end before the story reaches a satisfactory conclusion. But the biggest problem with', 'RWBY', 'isn\'t the minimal animation or erratic storytelling, but an utter lack of originality. Although director-cowriter Monty Oum begins his commentary talking about "stories I always wanted to tell," he and cowriters Miles Luna and Kerry Shawcross borrow pretty much everything from various anime', 'shojo', 'adventures, boarding school training series, and adventure quests, including', 'Naruto', 'and', 'Fairy Tail', '. Like', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', ',', 'RWBY', 'was created by American artists trying to capture the excitement and appeal of Japanese animation--but with notably less success. (Not rated; suitable for ages 10 and older: cartoon violence, violence against women, tobacco use)', '--Charles Solomon'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.92 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28928786', 'Director': 'Monty Oum', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 12, 2013', 'Actors': 'Barbara Dunkelman, Kara Eberle, Lindsay Tuggey, Arryn Zech', 'Studio': 'Cinedigm', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: If I have to explain it, then you probably wouldn't understand. But seriously, the music and story line are such that it's a really good story with character development along the way. There are some minor things that some people would find problematic but the animation is pretty good considering, Review Title: RWBY, what can I say? Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/04/03 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Don Hall', 'Chris Williams'], 'Producers': ['Roy Conli'], 'Starring': ['T.J. Miller', 'Jamie Chung', 'Maya Rudolph'], 'Studio': ['WALT DISNEY PICTURES']} Review Text: Pixar had rubbed off on Disney! This really reminds me of a Pixar film, good characters that have depth to them, an interesting take on the whole good guy / bad guy dynamic that is a nice surprise. I rented this to just to see if I wanted to purchase this, and yeah, I will buy the bluray Review Title: Good Movie Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/04/03 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Shawn Levy'], 'Producers': ['Shawn Levy', 'Chris Columbus', 'Mark Radcliffe'], 'Starring': ['Ben Stiller', 'Steve Coogan', 'Ricky Gervais'], 'Studio': ['Fox']} Review Text: Same old story except that this was a set up from the beginning to get this series over and done with.. Thank goodness.. If you have ever seen the other ones.. you know what is going to happen through most of the film. Review Title: Tired and more tired Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/08/22 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ron Howard'], 'Producers': ['Brian Grazer'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Daryl Hannah', 'Eugene Levy']} Review Text: Oldie but a goodie. Worth a watch for us when feeling nostalgic for the 80's.. Review Title: worth the price of rental Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/09/08 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Steven Suderman'], 'Producers': ['Steven Suderman'], 'Studio': ['FilmBuff']} Review Text: I thought that this would be about what was going on in America with the organic, small farms but instead this was about small farms in Canada. I know that there are some things in common however there is a big difference in the economic landscape between the two countries. It does bring home some of the aspects of farming .. Review Title: Eh, not bad Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/09/17 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Bobby Sheehan'], 'Producers': ['Bobby Sheehan'], 'Starring': ['Alanah Rafferty'], 'Studio': ['FilmBuff']} Review Text: This is not a film that you should watch if you believe in the cult of allopathy. In fact, this should cause you to have some hard questions for your health care provider. Is unfortunate that we as a culture have abdicated our responsibility for our own health and welfare to the people in white coats.. Review Title: Be aware, this could upset you Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/10/23 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tomm Moore'], 'Producers': ['Tomm Moore', 'Ross Murray', 'Paul Young', 'Stéphan Roelants', 'Serge Umé', 'Marc Umé', 'Isabelle Truc', 'Clément Calvet', 'Jérémie Fajner', 'Frederik Villumsen', 'Claus Toksvig Kjaer'], 'Starring': ['David Rawle', 'Brendan Gleeson', 'Fionnula Flannagan']} Review Text: Sweet little movie based off a celtic legend. The animation isn't the most cutting edge but the characters are such that you do end up caring about what happens to them. Review Title: Good family fare and some Celtic thrown in for good measure Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: That Sugar Film Review Date: 2016/08/17 Categories: International, Documentary, Cerebral, Contemplative Product Description: ['Damon Gameau embarks on an experiment to document the effects of a high sugar diet on a healthy body.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Samuel Goldwyn Films'], 'Producers': ['Samuel Goldwyn Films'], 'Starring': ['Damon Gameau']} Review Text: I know, I know, It's only the experience of one person who decided to film themselves, That may be true, however... IF the basis of modern western medicine is that each of our bodies is really close to somebody else's, and thats the basis of all antibiotics, pain relievers, etc. Then why when it comes to diet(or rather what we generally eat) suddenly the science is different? As you let that digest, here is my review.

Very good film. It makes the point that sugar in our daily diets can have a negative effect on our health. I for one watch my intake of fructose very closely anyway because I just plain feel better overall when I do not consume sugar in its myriad of forms. Watch the film, then decide for yourself if it makes sense.

It did for me. Review Title: Sweet film, will not give you tooth decay.. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cars 3 Review Date: 2017/12/30 Store: Owen Wilson (Actor), Cristela Alonzo (Actor), Brian Fee (Director) & 0 more Rated: G Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles Product Description: ["From Disney-Pixar, creators of FINDING DORY and Academy Award(R)winner INSIDE OUT (Best Animated Feature Film, 2015), comes an epic adventure packed with heart, hilarity and full-throttle FUN! Blindsided by a new generation of blazing-fast racers led by arrogant hotshot Jackson Storm, the legendary Lightning McQueen (Owen Wilson) is suddenly sidelined and pushed from the sport he loves. To get back on track, he'll need the help of eager young racing technician Cruz Ramirez, inspiration from the late Fabulous Hudson Hornet and a few unexpected twists and turns of fate. Bring home the high-octane hit that's fully loaded with unforgettable characters and spectacular animation!"] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Animation', 'Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Dubbed, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Armie Hammer, Darrell Waltrip, Larry the Cable Guy, Chris Cooper, Kerry Washington, Owen Wilson, Margo Martindale, Mike Rich, Ray Magliozzi, Kiel Murray, Lea DeLaria, Bonnie Hunt, Tony Shalhoub, Brian Fee, Isiah Whitlock, Bob Costas, John Ratzenberger, Guido Quaroni, Bob Peterson, Nathan Fillion, Cristela Alonzo, Tom MagliozziArmie Hammer, Darrell Waltrip, Larry the Cable Guy, Chris Cooper, Kerry Washington, Owen Wilson, Margo Martindale, Mike Rich, Ray Magliozzi, Kiel Murray, Lea DeLaria, Bonnie Hunt, Tony Shalhoub, Brian Fee, Isiah Whitlock, Bob Costas, John Ratzenberger, Guido Quaroni, B… See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '786936854565', 'Director': 'Brian Fee', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Dubbed, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours', 'Release date': 'November 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Owen Wilson, Cristela Alonzo, Chris Cooper, Nathan Fillion, Larry the Cable Guy', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'DISNEY/PIXAR', 'Writers': 'Kiel Murray, Bob Peterson, Mike Rich', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Way better than Cars2. They actually brought the heart from the 1st one back in this one. Generally Pixar does a good job. Review Title: The fun is back Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Was new to Prime, Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/04/12 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Zemeckis'], 'Producers': ['Robert Zemeckis', 'Steve Starkey', 'Carl Sagan', 'Ann Druyan'], 'Starring': ['Jodie Foster', 'Matthew McConaughey', 'James Woods']} Review Text: This movie is one heck of a ride. It will leave you guessing until the end, all the performances are really well done. The special effects are still holding up but are showing their age, but all in all it's a very good story and isn't that what makes a good movie? Review Title: Worth it! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/04/12 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Egami'], 'Starring': ['Gabriel Iglesias'], 'Studio': ['Egami']} Review Text: Stand up comedy at it's finest! Yes there are some "adult" themes but it was very refreshing to watch a entertainer that wasn't dropping a F bomb and words related to it every 5 minutes. Not that I find that kind of language offensive but to have a comedian not rely on those words to be funny... I'll be buying the DVD... Review Title: Funny, Funny, Funny! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/04/17 Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['KOBUN'], 'Producers': ['Shinsaku Tanaka', 'Ryuji Sekine', 'Hisato Usui', 'Takuro Hatakeyama'], 'Starring': ['Aoi Yuki', 'Daisuke Hirakawa', 'Rie Kugimiya'], 'Studio': ['A-Net Digital']} Review Text: The animation is different than the majority of the anime out there which is a plus, but since the "censorship" ink splashes detract from the visual which in this case has didn't really impact the storyline but did detract from the flow of the visuals. That is why I gave it the rating I did. Additionally since I am over 21 and live in a locality in which I am not prohibited in the viewing of adult images either of a sexual nature or of a violent nature I find that not having the option of choosing which version to watch rather distasteful Review Title: Mixed Bag Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mythbusters Review Date: 2013/06/17 Categories: Unscripted, Documentary, Kids, Special Interest Product Description: ['Adam Savage and Jamie Hyneman are at it again--getting to the bottom of popular myths one experiment at a time by combining science, curiosity, and inventiveness. Watch as Adam, Jamie and the rest of the MythBusters team see what really happens when you take candy from a baby, if people really do get cold feet when they are afraid, what happens when poop literally hits the fan and much more in this season of MythBusters.'] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Alice Dallow', 'Lauren Gray Williams', 'Tabitha Lentle', 'Steve Christiansen', 'Peter Rees', 'Andrew Farrell', 'Brian Leckey', 'Rob Hammersley', 'Eric Haven'], 'Producers': ['Linda Wolkovitch']} Review Text: Mythbusters, what else can I say? Your either a fan or your not. Since I'm a fan.. Abrams', 'Bryan Burk'], 'Starring': ['Tom Cruise', 'Jeremy Renner', 'Simon Pegg'], 'Studio': ['Hit Movies']} Review Text: This is one of those movies that is a great popcorn flick, but since Brad Bird directed it its a live action comic book Review Title: Brad Bird, at it again Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/13 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Dennis Principe Jr.', 'Julie Auerbach', 'Russell McCarroll', 'Stewart Shields', 'Matthew Ginsburg', 'Gary Auerbach', 'Gail Berman', 'Ron Brody', 'Tina Gazzerro', 'Lloyd Braun'], 'Studio': ['History']} Review Text: This is basically an anti - conspiracy show which is refreshing out of all the pro-conspiracy type of entertainment out there.
There are some episodes that I feel are a little light on the details but overall a decent show Review Title: Interesting Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/05/31 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Producers': ['Chris Sanders', 'Stephen C. Harris', 'Daniel Ollek', 'Hudie Ayalon', 'Mark Phillips', 'Eric Anderson', 'Courtney McKenna', 'Jesse Carter Russell', 'Merlin Camozzi', 'Renee Tod'], 'Studio': ['A&E Television Networks']} Review Text: Who doesn't like a good ghost story? Is very good that it's from real people, the only down side is that it seems like certain people just "give up" in this series and accept the abuse/etc from the ghosts Review Title: The real deal Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/05/31 Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Unavailable'], 'Producers': ['Bellevue Entertainment'], 'Studio': ['Unavailable']} Review Text: Very nicely produced series, a great deal of very beautiful scenery but there are times it seems like it's a advertisement for the national park service.. Review Title: Travel anyone? Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: RWBY Review Date: 2014/07/21 Store: Barbara Dunkelman (Actor), Kara Eberle (Actor), Monty Oum (Director) & 0 more Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Product Description', 'From the creators of smash hit Red vs. Blue comes RWBY, a visually-stunning and hotly anticipated new anime series. A young hero, an exalted heiress, a troubled rogue, and a party girl… These are the four members of RWBY, a team brought together and trained for the sole purpose of combating the rampant evils that plague the fantastic world of Remnant.', 'Amazon.com', 'RWBY', "(2013) is an anime-styled American web series from Rooster Teeth Studio; its title comes from the initials of the four main characters: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang. Ruby Rose is an eager, weapon-wielding 15-year-old who's about to enter the Beacon Academy to train to become a huntress, a warrior who fights the evils that plague the world of Remnant. She's put on a team with three other standard-issue young women: spoiled, self-assured Weiss Schnee; intellectual Blake Belladonna, who hides a dark past; and enthusiastic, supportive Yang Xiao Long. The uneasy quartet and their friends from other teams are soon training to handle weapons, carry out missions, slay monsters, and function as a team. As", 'RWBY', 'was created for the web on an obviously limited budget, the animation and designs are minimal at best. Secondary characters appear as black silhouettes and important actions often take place off camera or behind a screen of dust. The episodes only last 16 minutes, including the opening and closing titles, which may be a more awkward length to direct than the standard half-hour. Sometimes too much action is crowded into too short a space; other episodes end before the story reaches a satisfactory conclusion. But the biggest problem with', 'RWBY', 'isn\'t the minimal animation or erratic storytelling, but an utter lack of originality. Although director-cowriter Monty Oum begins his commentary talking about "stories I always wanted to tell," he and cowriters Miles Luna and Kerry Shawcross borrow pretty much everything from various anime', 'shojo', 'adventures, boarding school training series, and adventure quests, including', 'Naruto', 'and', 'Fairy Tail', '. Like', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', ',', 'RWBY', 'was created by American artists trying to capture the excitement and appeal of Japanese animation--but with notably less success. (Not rated; suitable for ages 10 and older: cartoon violence, violence against women, tobacco use)', '--Charles Solomon'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.92 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28928786', 'Director': 'Monty Oum', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Blu-ray, Dolby, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 12, 2013', 'Actors': 'Barbara Dunkelman, Kara Eberle, Lindsay Tuggey, Arryn Zech', 'Studio': 'Cinedigm', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: If I have to explain it, then you probably wouldn't understand. But seriously, the music and story line are such that it's a really good story with character development along the way. There are some minor things that some people would find problematic but the animation is pretty good considering, Review Title: RWBY, what can I say? Miller', 'Jamie Chung', 'Maya Rudolph'], 'Studio': ['WALT DISNEY PICTURES']} Review Text: Pixar had rubbed off on Disney! This really reminds me of a Pixar film, good characters that have depth to them, an interesting take on the whole good guy / bad guy dynamic that is a nice surprise. I rented this to just to see if I wanted to purchase this, and yeah, I will buy the bluray Review Title: Good Movie Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/04/03 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Shawn Levy'], 'Producers': ['Shawn Levy', 'Chris Columbus', 'Mark Radcliffe'], 'Starring': ['Ben Stiller', 'Steve Coogan', 'Ricky Gervais'], 'Studio': ['Fox']} Review Text: Same old story except that this was a set up from the beginning to get this series over and done with.. Thank goodness.. If you have ever seen the other ones.. you know what is going to happen through most of the film. Review Title: Tired and more tired Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/08/22 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ron Howard'], 'Producers': ['Brian Grazer'], 'Starring': ['Tom Hanks', 'Daryl Hannah', 'Eugene Levy']} Review Text: Oldie but a goodie. Worth a watch for us when feeling nostalgic for the 80's.. Review Title: worth the price of rental Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/09/08 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Steven Suderman'], 'Producers': ['Steven Suderman'], 'Studio': ['FilmBuff']} Review Text: I thought that this would be about what was going on in America with the organic, small farms but instead this was about small farms in Canada. I know that there are some things in common however there is a big difference in the economic landscape between the two countries. It does bring home some of the aspects of farming .. Review Title: Eh, not bad Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/09/17 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Bobby Sheehan'], 'Producers': ['Bobby Sheehan'], 'Starring': ['Alanah Rafferty'], 'Studio': ['FilmBuff']} Review Text: This is not a film that you should watch if you believe in the cult of allopathy. In fact, this should cause you to have some hard questions for your health care provider. Is unfortunate that we as a culture have abdicated our responsibility for our own health and welfare to the people in white coats.. Review Title: Be aware, this could upset you Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/10/23 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tomm Moore'], 'Producers': ['Tomm Moore', 'Ross Murray', 'Paul Young', 'Stéphan Roelants', 'Serge Umé', 'Marc Umé', 'Isabelle Truc', 'Clément Calvet', 'Jérémie Fajner', 'Frederik Villumsen', 'Claus Toksvig Kjaer'], 'Starring': ['David Rawle', 'Brendan Gleeson', 'Fionnula Flannagan']} Review Text: Sweet little movie based off a celtic legend. The animation isn't the most cutting edge but the characters are such that you do end up caring about what happens to them. Review Title: Good family fare and some Celtic thrown in for good measure Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: That Sugar Film Review Date: 2016/08/17 Categories: International, Documentary, Cerebral, Contemplative Product Description: ['Damon Gameau embarks on an experiment to document the effects of a high sugar diet on a healthy body.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Samuel Goldwyn Films'], 'Producers': ['Samuel Goldwyn Films'], 'Starring': ['Damon Gameau']} Review Text: I know, I know, It's only the experience of one person who decided to film themselves, That may be true, however... IF the basis of modern western medicine is that each of our bodies is really close to somebody else's, and thats the basis of all antibiotics, pain relievers, etc. Then why when it comes to diet(or rather what we generally eat) suddenly the science is different? As you let that digest, here is my review.

Very good film. It makes the point that sugar in our daily diets can have a negative effect on our health. I for one watch my intake of fructose very closely anyway because I just plain feel better overall when I do not consume sugar in its myriad of forms. Watch the film, then decide for yourself if it makes sense.

It did for me. Review Title: Sweet film, will not give you tooth decay.. raw_response:
**Shopping Behavior Analysis:**

**Key Preferences:**
- Enjoys a variety of content, primarily in **film and television**, spanning genres including **documentaries**, **animation**, **stand-up comedy**, and **science-based shows**.
- Shows a strong preference for **well-rated productions** (average ratings consistently around 4.0 and above), indicating a focus on quality.
- Appreciates engaging **storylines** with character depth and development, particularly in animated features and narratives involving supernatural themes.

**Trends:**
- **Animation/Anime**: High ratings for animated content (e.g., comedy and fantasy genres) suggest a favored interest in animated storytelling.
- **Documentaries**: Positive reviews for documentaries emphasize a preference for educational themes, including science and social issues.
- **Humor**: Enjoyment of comedy that balances adult themes without excessive profanity shows a preference for witty and thoughtful humor over crude comedy.
- **Nostalgic and Classic Films**: Shows appreciation for older films, indicating that they value **nostalgic experiences** tied to their viewing choices.
- **Curation and Discovery**: Engages in reviewing content as part of the purchasing process, indicating a reflective approach to media consumption.

Overall, this person values high-quality content that provides meaningful narratives while also enjoying light-hearted comedy and science-related themes.
